name: FEDE - Long Form Articles
description:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/MLBWEB-429
Make a call to DAPI endpoint, grab the slug from "type": "album" object and make a graphQL request with the slug

Example: 

DAPi: https://beta-dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/stories/masanori-murakami-first-japanese-player-in-mlb
Graph:  `query { getPhotoAlbum(slug: "test-album-for-waterfall-dr-1", language: ES_US) {format templateUrl  title caption credit } }`
